title: The Midnight Sky
description: A lone scientist in the Arctic races to contact a crew of astronauts returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

title: Tenet
description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the world, a protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

title: Dune
description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral of social revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his infamous alter-ego: The Joker.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, the King of Wakanda, rises to the throne in the isolated, technologically advanced African nation, but his claim is challenged by a vengeful outsider.

title: The Batman
description: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

title: Eternals
description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
description: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg, and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
